definition: Describing an organism or a behavior that happens irregularly with regards to time of day, as opposed to diurnal, nocturnal, or crepuscular.
details:
adjective
- Describing an organism or a behavior that happens irregularly with regards to time of day, as opposed to diurnal, nocturnal, or crepuscular.
= example: Describing an organism or a behavior that happens irregularly with regards to time of day, as opposed to diurnal, nocturnal, or crepuscular.
